title: Paris/11th arrondissement
name: Nouveau Casino et Café Charbon
directions: Métro Parmentier, across the street from Justine's
content: The New Casino keeps rocking until dawn both in the bar downstairs and the medium-size dance hall upstairs, making it ''the'' favourite among young Parisians, especially after the other places in the neighbourhood have closed. The dance/concert hall features cutting-edge indie rock groups and cutting-edge electronica. The prices do reflect the hipness however.
